title: Fate
description: Jake Keller met Madison Wright when he was six years old. They were instantly friends. He makes a terrible mistake in high school that leads to a heartbreaking fight with Madison. They become bitter enemies until a horrific tragedy brings them together again. But can he hold onto her?Follow Jake and his group of friends through the trials of high school and new adulthood.This book is the second book of the Soulmates Series, but can be read as a standalone.*Not recommended for anyone under 18 due to strong language, sexual situations, and alcohol references
author: Nicole Dykes
